titleStmt.title: The disorders of love truly expressed in the unfortunate amours of Givry with Mademoiselle de Guise / made English from the French.
Désordres de l'amour. English
titleStmt.author: Villedieu, Madame de, d. 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for James Magnes and Richard Bentley ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Marie Catherine Hortense Desjardins (known as Mme. de Villedieu). Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
